name: J.K. Rowling
details: British author best known for the Harry Potter series.

name: George Orwell
details: English novelist and essayist, known for '1984' and 'Animal Farm'.

name: Agatha Christie
details: English writer known for her detective novels and short story collections.

name: F. Scott Fitzgerald
details: American novelist and short story writer, famous for 'The Great Gatsby'.

name: Jane Austen
details: English novelist known for her romantic fiction set among the landed gentry.
